segments.text: I'm sorry , it was too cold , and my car couldn't start . I had one to the garage with the heater . I tried to call you , but you couldn't get connection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , your number is out of service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I didn't know . Let me check . You're right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a serious problem . I make expecting an important call . The theater is guilty . It supposed to call me this evening , and discuss my play . What were happened if they can't reach me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the only thing you can do is pay the fee to recover your service .
segments.speaker: S2
